id.description: The unique ID of the metafield.

key.description: The key that identifies the metafield.

value.description: The actual value stored in the metafield.

value_type.description: The type of the value stored in the metafield.

owner_id.description: The ID of the owner of the metafield.

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was last updated.

owner_resource.description: The type of resource that owns the metafield.

type.description: The data type of the value stored in the metafield.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The admin GraphQL API ID of the metafield.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the metafield belongs.
